Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIb bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Streptococcus thermophilus SFi3, Clostridium botulinum, Listeria monocytogenes, Bacillus cereus.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: ThmB, by itself, is not bactericidal. An equal amount of ThmB can increase the activity of ThmA by 40 fold, however, an excess of ThmB inhibits the activity of ThmA. Disulfide bonds are not required for activity.

Literature.Title: Thermophilin 13, a nontypical antilisterial poration complex bacteriocin, that functions without a receptor.
Literature.Author: Marciset O, Jeronimus-Stratingh MC, Mollet B, Poolman B.
